sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: ImageMagick contains animate, composite, conjure, convert, display, identify, import, mogrify, montage, and the libMagick and libMagick++ libraries.

sect3.title: composite
sect3.para: Composites various images into the given base image.

sect3.title: conjure
sect3.para: Processes a Magick Scripting Language (MSL) script to create an image.

sect3.title: convert
sect3.para: Convert image(s) from one format to another.

sect3.title: identify
sect3.para: Describes the format and characteristics of an image file.

sect3.title: montage
sect3.para: Composites various images into a new image.
